admission: Admissions open from June 1st. Visit the admission cell for details.
courses: The college offers B.Tech, M.Tech, BBA, MBA, MCA, and PhD programs.
mess: The mess provides both vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals. Timings are 7 AM to 9 PM.
hostel: Hostel accommodation is available for both boys and girls with WiFi and security.
library: Library timings are 9 AM to 6 PM from Monday to Saturday.
exam: Exam schedule will be announced by the exam cell and updated on the notice board.
sports: Annual sports meet will be held in December. Daily sports facilities are also available.
labs: Labs are open from 9 AM to 5 PM. Students must carry their ID cards.
canteen: Canteen provides snacks, meals, and beverages from 8 AM to 8 PM.
nestcafe: NestCafe is open till 11 PM with fast food and coffee.
cultural_committee: The Cultural Committee organizes events like dance, drama, and music competitions.
college_fest: The annual college fest 'TechnoCultural Week' is held in February.
placement: Placement cell is located in Block B. Training sessions are held every Friday.
transport: College buses are available from 15 different routes in the city.
scholarship: Scholarships are provided based on merit and need. Apply at the admin office.
